fields.headline: Genius crossword No 178
fields.bodyText: Click here to access the print version. The wordplay of each clue contains an extra letter, not required for its solution. Twelve of the clues lack a definition and are incorrectly numbered. Their 12 solutions fall into two groups, each with a common theme. When the clues for these 12 solutions are correctly numbered and properly placed, the ‘extra’ letters from all 32 clues in order spell out a description of the exercise, with a label for each. Deadline for entries is 23:59 GMT on Saturday 5 May. You need to register once and then sign in to theguardian.com to enter our online competition for a £100 monthly prize. Click here to register.
